articles.headline: How 7 Friends Testing a Metal Detector Made Britain’s Most Valuable Treasure Find
articles.snippet: A pastime in a farmer’s field led to the discovery of Norman-era coins valued at more than $5 million.
articles.abstract: A pastime in a farmer’s field led to the discovery of Norman-era coins valued at more than $5 million.
articles.lead_paragraph: The group huddled together in the farmer’s field, staring at the dozen or so medieval silver coins. They had found one, then two, and a third — Adam Staples knew, then, this was something special.

articles.headline: District Attorney Will Ask Court to Resentence Menendez Brothers
articles.snippet: The request from George Gascón, the Los Angeles County district attorney, could lead to Lyle and Erik Menendez being released from prison, decades after they were convicted of murdering their parents.
articles.abstract: The request from George Gascón, the Los Angeles County district attorney, could lead to Lyle and Erik Menendez being released from prison, decades after they were convicted of murdering their parents.
articles.lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles County district attorney said on Thursday that he would request the resentencing of Lyle and Erik Menendez, who killed their parents in 1989, a step that could lead to their release from prison.
articles.byline: By Tim Arango and Matt Stevens

articles.headline: The Group at the Center of Trump’s Planning for a Second Term Is One You Haven’t Heard of
articles.snippet: America First Policy Institute didn’t even exist four years ago. But it is poised to be more influential than Project 2025.
articles.abstract: America First Policy Institute didn’t even exist four years ago. But it is poised to be more influential than Project 2025.
articles.lead_paragraph: Late this summer, a prominent right-wing think tank invited conservatives from around the country to learn how to work in a second Donald J. Trump administration.
articles.byline: By Ken Bensinger and David A. Fahrenthold

articles.headline: Email From Boeing to Ethiopian Airlines Sheds Light on a Tragic Crash
articles.snippet: Newly revealed correspondence indicates that a Boeing senior official counseled that the company could answer a pilot’s safety question, but it did not.
articles.abstract: Newly revealed correspondence indicates that a Boeing senior official counseled that the company could answer a pilot’s safety question, but it did not.
articles.lead_paragraph: The questions came in the form of an email on Dec. 1, 2018, to Boeing from the chief pilot at Ethiopian Airlines. They were detailed and filled with aviation jargon. One of them was 452 words.

articles.headline: As Election Day Nears, Democrats Test Just How Powerful Abortion Really Is
articles.snippet: They hope the issue helps their candidates. But some voters may support Republican candidates as well as abortion-rights ballot measures.
articles.abstract: They hope the issue helps their candidates. But some voters may support Republican candidates as well as abortion-rights ballot measures.
articles.lead_paragraph: With Election Day closing in, there are signs that a small but crucial segment of voters may back both abortion rights and Republican candidates, a dynamic that could hurt Vice President Kamala Harris in swing states and other Democratic candidates in pivotal races.
articles.byline: By Elizabeth Dias and Lisa Lerer

articles.headline: U.S. Bond Market Braces for the ‘Trump Trade’ of Large Tariffs and Deficits
articles.snippet: As investors have focused on the potential fiscal and economic impact of the Republican candidate’s proposals, yields on Treasury debt have risen.
articles.abstract: As investors have focused on the potential fiscal and economic impact of the Republican candidate’s proposals, yields on Treasury debt have risen.
articles.lead_paragraph: The $28 trillion Treasury market is arguably the most foundational financial market in the world. It’s where the U.S. government auctions its debt to investors who buy and trade that debt, influencing borrowing costs across the globe.
articles.byline: By Talmon Joseph Smith and Joe Rennison

articles.headline: The Crypto Website Where the Election Odds Swing in Trump’s Favor
articles.snippet: Donald Trump, Elon Musk and CNN have cited election predictions from Polymarket, a betting site where crypto enthusiasts have wagered more than $100 million on who will win the presidency.
articles.abstract: Donald Trump, Elon Musk and CNN have cited election predictions from Polymarket, a betting site where crypto enthusiasts have wagered more than $100 million on who will win the presidency.
articles.lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump posted a colorful graphic on social media this week, suggesting that he was headed for victory in the presidential election.
articles.byline: By David Yaffe-Bellany and Erin Griffith

articles.headline: Harris and Trump Deadlocked to the End, Final Times/Siena National Poll Finds
articles.snippet: The electorate has rarely seemed so evenly divided. The latest New York Times/Siena College poll found Harris and Trump tied 48 to 48.
articles.abstract: The electorate has rarely seemed so evenly divided. The latest New York Times/Siena College poll found Harris and Trump tied 48 to 48.
articles.lead_paragraph: Kamala Harris and Donald J. Trump are locked in a dead heat for the popular vote, 48 percent to 48 percent, the final national poll by The New York Times and Siena College has found, as Ms. Harris struggles for an edge over Mr. Trump with an electorate that seems impossibly and immovably divided.
articles.byline: By Adam Nagourney and Ruth Igielnik
